amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Postsecondary institution; charge for tuition or fees; loans; prohibited acts.
amendatorysection.para: No postsecondary institution with an authorization to operate under the Postsecondary Institution Act shall charge tuition or fees for more than one academic term or require a student to sign loan documents for more than one academic year.
